title: Best Open Source AI Tools - Top Picks for 2025
metaDescription: Discover the 12 best open source AI tools in 2025. Compare features, pricing & reviews to find the perfect tool for your needs.
introduction: Looking for the best open source AI tools in 2025? We've analyzed hundreds of tools to bring you this curated list of the top 12 options. Whether you're a developer, business, or individual user, this guide helps you choose the right open source AI tool.

platforms.name: TensorFlow
platforms.description: End-to-end open-source platform by Google for scalable machine learning and deep-learning model development, training, and deployment.

platforms.name: Hugging Face
platforms.description: Open platform for machine learning with model hosting, datasets, and collaborative AI development tools.

platforms.name: CVAT
platforms.description: Open-source web-based video and image annotation tool developed by Intel, supporting 2D/3D labeling and team workflows.

platforms.name: FiftyOne
platforms.description: Open-source tool for dataset visualization, analysis, and model evaluation with powerful filtering and similarity search capabilities.

platforms.name: QuPath
platforms.description: Free open-source software for annotation and analysis of large-format whole-slide images in pathology and biomedical research.

platforms.name: Supervision
platforms.description: Open-source toolkit for computer vision projects offering utilities for video processing, detection visualization, and format conversion.

platforms.name: Jan
platforms.description: Open-source ChatGPT alternative that runs 100% offline on your computer with support for various open-source language models.

platforms.name: Meta LLaMA 3
platforms.description: Meta's open-source large language model family offering high performance across multiple languages and tasks.

platforms.name: MOSTLY AI
platforms.description: Privacy-safe synthetic data platform with open-source SDK for generating high-fidelity tabular and visual datasets with differential privacy.

platforms.name: Together AI
platforms.description: Platform for running and fine-tuning open-source AI models with high-performance inference and training capabilities.

platforms.name: CTGAN
platforms.description: Conditional Table Generation using Adversarial Networks for creating high-fidelity synthetic tabular data with GAN architecture.

platforms.name: GPT4All
platforms.description: Ecosystem of open-source chatbots trained on massive curated corpus of clean assistant data including code, stories, and dialogue.

verdict: All 12 open source AI tools on this list are excellent choices, each with unique strengths. TensorFlow leads with AI, while Hugging Face offers AI. Your best choice depends on your specific requirements, budget, and technical expertise.
